Class HDBManagerProjectController

java.lang.Object
controller.HDBManagerProjectController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IHDBManagerProjectController
public class HDBManagerProjectController extends Object implements IHDBManagerProjectController
Controller class for handling HDB Manager project management interactions

    • createProject

      public String createProject(String name, String neighborhood, String applicationOpenDateStr, String applicationCloseDateStr, String availableOfficerSlotsStr, HDBManager manager)
      Creates a new project
      Specified by:
      createProject in interface IHDBManagerProjectController
      Parameters:
      name - Project name
      neighborhood - Project neighborhood
      applicationOpenDateStr - Application opening date (dd/MM/yyyy)
      applicationCloseDateStr - Application closing date (dd/MM/yyyy)
      availableOfficerSlotsStr - Number of available officer slots
      manager - The manager creating the project
      Returns:
      Result message indicating success or failure

      Checks if a manager is handling a project during a specific period
      Parameters:
      manager - The manager to check
      startDate - Start date of the period
      endDate - End date of the period
      Returns:
      true if the manager is handling a project during the period, false otherwise

    • parseVisibility

      private boolean parseVisibility(String visibilityStr)
      Parses a visibility string
      Parameters:
      visibilityStr - Visibility string ("on" or "off")
      Returns:
      true for "on", false for "off"
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the string is neither "on" nor "off"
